original_text: Joseph continued to say to his brothers, ‘As I speak to you now, you can all see clearly that I really am Joseph. My brother Benjamin also knows that.
korean_text: 당신들의 눈과 내 아우 베냐민의 눈이 보는 바 당신들에게 이 말을 하는 것은 내 입이라

sentences.original_text: Joseph continued to say to his brothers
As I speak to you now

sentences.korean_translation: 너희 모두가 분명히 볼 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: My brother Benjamin also knows that
